.mt5{margin-top:5px!important}.mt10{margin-top:10px!important}.mt20{margin-top:20px!important}.mb10{margin-bottom:10px!important}.mb5{margin-bottom:5px}.mr5{margin-right:5px}.mr10{margin-right:10px}.mr20{margin-right:20px}.ml10{margin-left:10px!important}.ml5{margin-left:5px}img{max-width:100%}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{border-radius:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:6px}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:10px;background-color:#555}body{-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;background:#2d3743;font-family:'Source Sans Pro',sans-serif}body.blurall>:not(.modal){-webkit-filter:blur(8px);filter:blur(8px)}a{text-decoration:none!important}header{box-shadow:0 3px 7px rgba(0,0,0,.45);padding:18px;background:#081c24;width:100%;display:table;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;z-index:43}#menu ul.top-menu li,.header-logo{display:inline-block;float:left;position:relative}.header-logo{margin-top:7px;margin-right:50px}.header-logo:after{content:"";display:inline-block;height:60px;position:absolute;right:-30px;top:5px;width:1px}.header-logo h1,.header-logo p{font-size:0;margin:0}.nav-up{top:-70px}#logo{height: 50px;width: 188px;display: inline-block;color: red;font-weight: 700;font-size: 27px;margin-top: 9px;}#menu{float:left}#menu ul.top-menu{list-style:none;padding:0}#menu ul.top-menu li{margin:0 5px}#menu ul.top-menu li a{height:70px;line-height:70px;margin:0;padding:0 5px;font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#fff;display:inline-block}#menu ul.top-menu li.active a,#menu ul.top-menu li:hover a{color:#ed4a38}#menu ul.top-menu li.active a{border-bottom:3px solid #00bcd4}#menu .sub-container{border-top:#ed4a38 2px solid;display:none;position:absolute;top:70px;left:-205px;width:500px;background:#081c24;z-index:5}#menu .sub-container ul.sub-menu{padding:10px;overflow:hidden}#menu .sub-container ul.sub-menu li{width:30%;float:left;margin:0 1.65%}#menu .sub-container ul.sub-menu li a{height:30px;line-height:30px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:12px;padding:0 10px;display:block;border-bottom:none!important}#menu .sub-container ul.sub-menu li:hover a{color:#333!important}#menu ul.top-menu li:hover .sub-container ul.sub-menu li a{color:#868e91}#menu ul.top-menu li:hover>.sub-container,.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:hover .mli-info .mli-desc{display:block}#search{float:right;width:295px;margin-top:17px;position:relative}#search input.search-input{border:0;padding:0;box-shadow:none!important;background:0 0;border-radius:0;border-bottom:1px solid #999}#search input.search-input:focus{color:#fff;border-bottom:1px solid #fff}.mobile-menu,.mobile-search{display:none}.mobile-menu{left:15px}.mobile-search{right:15px}@media screen and (max-width:992px){header .header-logo{left:50%;margin-left:-93.5px;margin-top: -12px;margin-right: 50px;}#search{width:100%;margin-bottom:10px;display:none}#menu{text-align:center;display:none}#menu .sub-container{width:100%;left:0}#menu,#menu .top-menu li{width:100%}.mobile-menu,.mobile-search{display:inline-block;cursor:pointer;height:34px;width:34px;text-align:center;background:#ed4a38;border-radius:3px;position:absolute;top:17px;font-size:18px;line-height:32px}}.row{margin-right:-25px;margin-left:-25px}.trai{padding-right:0}.phai,.trai{float:left;display:block;min-height:120px}@media (max-width:768px){.phai,.trai{width:100%}}.movies-list,.movies-list-wrap{display:block;margin:0 0 40px}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title{display:block;margin-bottom:10px}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title span{font-weight:400;width:100%;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0;color:#ccc;text-align:center;display:inline-block;padding:0 65px 0 0;font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:19px; padding-left: 0px;}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title span i{font-size:14px}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title .nav-tabs{display:inline-block;margin-left:15px;border-bottom:none}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title .nav-tabs li.active a{border-radius:3px}.movies-list-wrap .ml-title .nav-tabs li a{border:0;height:40px;line-height:40px;padding:0 15px;text-align:center;min-width:80px;color:#333}.movies-list{margin:0}.movies-list .ml-item-wrap{width:100%;padding-bottom:157.36%}.movies-list .ml-item{box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;font-size:14px;border:3px solid transparent;width:19.8%;float:left;position:relative;overflow:hidden;}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-quality{background:#fed700;border-radius:3px;color:#222;font-size:11px;font-weight:500;height:auto;line-height:normal;padding:4px 6px;position:absolute;right:8px;top:8px;width:auto;z-index:4}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-thumb{width:100%;height:100%}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:hover .mli-thumb{filter:brightness(45%)}.mv-main .mv-cover-wrap img.thumb,img.thumb.mli-thumb{width:100%!important;height:auto!important;min-height:100%!important}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-info{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:auto;padding:10px;border-top:#ed4a38 2px solid;background:#263238;z-index:5}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-info h2,.movies-list .ml-item .mli-info h3{white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;font-size:100%;margin:0;font-weight:700;text-align:center;color:#fff;text-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.6)}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-info h3{transition:all .2s ease 0s;-webkit-transition:all .2s ease 0s;padding:2px;font-size:12px;font-weight:400}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-eps{position:absolute;top:10px;right:10px;width:40px;padding-top:8px;text-align:center;height:40px;border-radius:50%;background:rgba(72,207,173,.5);color:#fff;font-size:10px;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:1em;text-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.movies-list .ml-item .mli-eps i{display:block;font-weight:700;font-size:12px;font-style:normal;margin-top:3px}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask{display:inline-block;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:before{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-top:-50px;margin-left:-30px;content:"";border-radius:50%;background:#ed4a38;width:60px;height:60px;opacity:0}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:hover:after,.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:hover:before{opacity:1}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:after{content:"";width:0;height:0;border-top:20px solid transparent;border-bottom:20px solid transparent;border-left:30px solid rgba(255,255,255,.85);opacity:0;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-top:-39.5px;margin-left:-9.5px}.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:after,.movies-list .ml-item .ml-mask:before{transition:all .2s ease 0s;-webkit-transition:all .2s ease 0s;z-index:4}.ml-item .ml-mask .mli-status{position:absolute;top:2px;left:0;background:#365979;padding:5px;color:#fff;font-size:11px;text-align:center}.movies-list .ml-item:hover .ml-item-wrap .mli-info{font-weight:700}.movies-list-wrap .ml-more{display:block;width:100%;margin-top:5px;padding:5px;background:rgba(38,50,56,.9);text-align:center}.movies-list-wrap .ml-more:hover{background:#263238}.ml-snipet,.mv-postbody{display:none}@media (max-width:1200px){.movies-list .ml-item{width:30.5%}}@media (max-width:510px){.movies-list .ml-item{width:47.5%}}.mv-main{width:100%;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;overflow:hidden}.mv-main .mv-cover-wrap{width:100%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;position:absolute}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay{cursor:pointer;transition:linear .1s;position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;background:rgba(0,0,0,.7)}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.45)}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play{position:absolute;z-index:10;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);box-sizing:content-box;display:block;width:32px;height:44px;border-radius:50%;padding:18px 20px 18px 28px;cursor:pointer}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play:after,.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play:before{content:"";position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);display:block;width:80px;height:80px;border-radius:50%}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play:before{background:#ba1f24;animation:pulse-border 1.5s ease-out infinite;z-index:0}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play:after{z-index:1;background:#fa183d;transition:all .2s}.mv-main .mv-cover-overlay .mv-cover-play span{cursor:pointer;display:block;position:relative;z-index:3;width:0;height:0;border-left:32px solid #fff;border-top:22px solid transparent;border-bottom:22px solid transparent}@keyframes pulse-border{0%{transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%) translateZ(0) scale(1);opacity:1}to{transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%) translateZ(0) scale(1.5);opacity:0}}.mv-main .mv-cover-info{position:absolute;top:5px;left:5px;color:silver}.mv-main .mv-cover-info h1{font-size:18px;color:#fff;font-weight:700;margin:0}.mv-trailer-button{cursor:pointer;background:#fa183d;color:#f6f7f9;opacity:.5;border-radius:5px;position:absolute;padding:10px;bottom:10px;right:10px}.mv-main .mv-video .btn-action-sources:hover,.mv-trailer-button:hover{opacity:.75}.mv-tabs-nav{cursor:pointer;margin:0;background:#dacb46;padding:0;align-items:baseline;justify-content:space-between;display:flex;list-style-type:none}.mv-tabs-nav li{transition:linear .1s;font-weight:700;text-align:center;width:25%;color:#333;padding:10px 20px}.mv-tabs,.mv-tabs-nav li.active,.mv-tabs-nav li:hover{color:#d65562;background:#19293a}.mv-tabs{display:none;color:#ccc;padding:10px}.mv-tabs.active{display:block}.tab-desc .mv-desc-top{border:#ccc dashed 1px}.tab-desc .mv-desc-top a{color:#ff5722}.tab-desc .mv-desc-top a:focus,.tab-desc .mv-desc-top a:hover{color:#e64a19}.tab-media{height:300px;overflow:hidden;overflow-x:scroll;white-space:nowrap}.tab-media img{display:inline-block;height:300px;width:auto}.tab-media iframe{width:450px;height:280px;vertical-align:top;border:0}#FeaturePostsDangchieu,#PopularPosts2,#PopularPosts3,.mv-main .mv-video{display:none}.mv-main .mv-video #iframe-player{border:0;width:100%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;position:absolute}.mv-main .mv-video .btn-action-sources{cursor:pointer;position:absolute;bottom:60px;right:8px;z-index:100;padding:5px;font-size:14px;background:#27ae60;color:#fff;opacity:.5;text-align:center;transition:linear .1s;border-radius:5px}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar{position:absolute;top:0;opacity:.75;transition:ease .5s;right:-300px;height:100%;width:300px;max-width:100%;background:#263238}@media (max-width:510px){.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar{width:100%;right:-100%}}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar h4{background:#27ae60;color:#fff;text-align:center;margin:0;padding-bottom:6px;text-transform:uppercase}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar .mvi-source-wrap{overflow:scroll;height:100%;padding-bottom:15px}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar .mvi-source-wrap id{cursor:pointer;width:100%;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6);display:block;text-align:center;padding:5px;transition:linear .1s}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar .mvi-source-wrap id.active,.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar .mvi-source-wrap id:hover{background:#d65562;color:#fff}.mv-main .mv-video .mvi-source-sidebar .mvi-source-wrap id.active:before{content:"\f04b";font-family:'FontAwesome';font-size:10px;margin-right:10px;font-weight:400}.widget-content{margin-top:26px}.widget-content ul{padding:0}.search-result li,.widget-content ul li{list-style:none;padding:5px}.search-result li:hover,.widget-content ul li:hover{background:#101a25}.widget-content ul li .item-content .item-thumbnail{float:left;margin-right:5px;height:72px;overflow:hidden}.widget-content ul li .item-content .item-thumbnail img{width:72px;height:auto}.search-result li .item-content .item-meta .item-title h3,.widget-content ul li .item-content .item-meta .item-title h3{margin:0;font-size:16px;font-weight:700;color:#ddd;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.search-result li .item-content .item-meta .item-title h4,.widget-content ul li .item-content .item-meta .item-title h4{margin:0;font-size:14px;color:#666;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.search-result li .item-content .item-meta .item-snippet,.widget-content ul li .item-content .item-meta .item-snippet{font-weight:700;padding:2px;background:#dacb46;color:#000;border-radius:5px;display:block;}.movielistTab div{white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;cursor:pointer;width:33.33%;float:left;color:#ddd;text-align:center;padding:3px;background:#365979}.movielistTab div.active,.widget-content{background:#19293a}.sb-title{font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:21px;display:inline-block;text-transform:uppercase}footer{box-shadow:10px 0 64px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.5);background:#111315;margin-top:30px}.sb-title,footer a{color:#ccc}#footer .footer-link{float:left;margin-right:60px}#footer .footer-link.end{margin-right:0}#footer .footer-link-head{font-size:16px}.footer-tags{text-align:center}.footer-tags a{margin:5px;color:#fff;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:.5px;display:inline-block;line-height:20px;height:23px;padding:0 12px;border:1px solid #444;border-radius:15px;font-size:12px;background:rgba(255,255,255,.04)}.footer-tags a:hover{color:#7dbcd4}#bread .breadcrumb{border-radius:12px;color:#fff;display:inline-block;background:#171d23;padding:3px;margin-top:-8px}#bread .breadcrumb a,footer{color:#fff}#bread .breadcrumb>.active{color:#d65562}#blog-pager{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}#blog-pager 30px;background:#152230}.pp-profile .pp-profile-meta .pp-profile-more span:hover{background:#101c29}.pp-profile .pp-profile-meta h4{font-weight:600;line-height:1.3em;font-size:1.3em}.pp-profile div.p: Cada filme no site foram coletados de uma variedade de fontes.
IsenÃ§Ã£o de responsabilidade: o site nÃ£o hospeda filmes. Todos os filmes sÃ£o obtidos de um servidor de terceiros.
